note: Data from international providers and national agencies. Learning outcomes over time should still be interpreted with caution.
title: Share of students in early primary education achieving minimum reading proficiency
subtitle: Students in grades 2 or 3. Minimum proficiency for grade 2 is defined as: _"They read and comprehend most of written words, particularly familiar ones, and extract explicit information from sentences"_. For grade 3 it is defined as: _"Students read aloud written words accurately and fluently. They understand the overall meaning of sentences and short texts"_.
